name: SuperMess
description:
Wreck your living room, if you dare...

This is a virtual reality (VR for HTC Vive) game developed for the Chillennium Game Jam 2017 at Texas A&M University. The theme for this competition was "role reversal"

Team name: We Used To Go Here

Team members:
